transArray.content: The hotel in Haidian District has convenient transportation and convenient parking. The room is clean, the service is very good, the location is very good, and the environment downstairs is also very good

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated refrigerators, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories and sincere expectations. Your next visit! Manager: Zhao Dan
